title: Forgot my email
body: I forgot my email and need help recovering it. I dont remember much information about this account as my Dad put fake information for privacy reasons. Please someone help me recover it.

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  You can also review our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) which provides details on some verification quests you may be asked.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
